Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his initial encounters, setting up his origin and early conflicts both underwater and on land.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Origin and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor's origin and his first encounter with divers underwater, hinting at an immediate threat.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd transitions back to his taxi driver identity, picking up suspicious passengers and noticing he is being followed, building suspense on land.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Pier Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor after dropping off passengers, reacting to a speeding sedan and preparing for action on land.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelation and Yacht Plot
sub_scenes.description: In the hospital, a new threat is revealed: a yacht and Japanese submarine plot, shifting the narrative towards espionage and wartime intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot
Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Submarine Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the investigation on the yacht, the discovery of the submarine plot, and the underwater confrontation with enemy forces.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Suspicion and Depth Chart Clue
sub_scenes.description: Introducing Pete's suspicion on the yacht and Duke's discovery of the depth chart, setting up the reveal of the submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Namor is introduced and dives into action, becoming involved in the underwater conflict related to the submarine plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat with Divers
sub_scenes.description: Namor engages in underwater combat with divers guarding the submarine, escalating the action and conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle
Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Pursuit and Espionage Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the pursuit of the yacht, the discovery of Peter's betrayal, and the resolution of the submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Chase and Peter's Death
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues the yacht and discovers Peter's body, leading to initial shock and then suspicion of foul play.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet

sub_scenes.title: Peter's Cabin Investigation and Espionage Uncovered
sub_scenes.description: Investigation of Peter's cabin reveals his connection to the Japanese Navy, uncovering espionage and betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Concluding the yacht/submarine plot, focusing on Holden's recovery and the characters returning home, ending the immediate danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Garage Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline focusing on the Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends and a separate mystery involving an ambulance and a garage.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends, setting up a conflict with clear antagonists.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person
sub_scenes.description: A separate scene with boys observing an ambulance, leading to the reveal of an injured person and sparking curiosity.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Garage Investigation Begins
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet with a garage address, initiating a new investigation towards the Transcontinental Bus Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Capture and Mr. Horst Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the boys' journey to the garage, their capture, and confrontation with Mr. Horst, leading to escalating danger.

sub_scenes.title: Police Interception and Journey to Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys are intercepted by police and taken to an unknown location, setting up a confrontation with Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Threat
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst, followed by a parallel scene revealing a deadly plan to use carbon monoxide against them.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Violent Intervention and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes violently to save the boys, leading to a chaotic fight and the boys' escape.

Major_Arcs.title: Escape and Marine Barracks Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the boys' escape, the arrival of Marines, and the resolution of the Nazi spy ring plot at the garage and Marine Barracks.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Marine Barracks Incident
sub_scenes.description: Boys decide to seek help, while a separate incident occurs at the Marine Barracks with a car crash.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Office Stand-off and Marine Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself and is aided by Major Bronson, leading to the arrival of Marines and resolution of the Nazi plot.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ's South American Adventure Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry, setting up a new adventure in South America against 'Hitler tools'.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the premise of their fight against 'Hitler tools' in a South American setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry face interrogation, leading to the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: Exposition of El Tigre's demands and a forced journey begins, setting up a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan and Hideout Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Rescue plan is clarified, and a stealthy infiltration of El Tigre's hideout begins using diversion tactics.

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Resolution in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the efforts to rescue Rosita, the confrontation with Axis agents, and the resolution of the South American plot.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Humiliation of a character and desperate search for Rosita within the hideout, leading to a broader revelation about Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Internal Dispute and Rescue Mission Launch
sub_scenes.description: Internal dispute concerning El Tigre is interrupted by news of Rosita's location, leading to a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Infiltration and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit of Axis forces, infiltration of a hotel, and the successful encounter with Rosita amidst combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Combat and Presidential Orders
sub_scenes.description: Intense combat within the hotel, escalating to machine guns and involving Presidential orders, culminating in Rosita's rescue and recognition for Champ.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, focusing on espionage, compromised plans, and native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat before receiving a grave report about compromised plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Native Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks through the jungle, faces a dart attack, and is ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Capture and interrogation of spies for sub detector plans, leading to betrayal and handing over of information.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Fiery Diversion and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Fiery diversion is set, leading to Dolan's escape, native attack aftermath, and unexpected alliance with natives.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Duty and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the captain's decision driven by fatherly duty and Dolan's subsequent disciplinary action, concluding the Dolan storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Surrender and Surprise Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Captain decides to surrender, leading to a surprise encounter and a brawl.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker's Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story with the 'Twinkle Twins' investigating the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the banker's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Twins gather information, follow a lead to the police station, and then to the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

sub_scenes.title: Barnacci's Racketeering and Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Twins suspect Barnacci, discover the blood transfusion need for Reilly's daughter, and seek more information.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Twins inquire in the Irish section, leading to Mrs. Murphy revealing Reilly's innocence and Farnacci's scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

Major_Arcs.title: Farnacci's Capture and Community Blood Drive Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline by detailing the chase and capture of Farnacci, leading to a community blood drive and a happy resolution for Reilly's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Cab Chase and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Escape attempt leads to a cab chase and a street brawl, escalating the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Aid
sub_scenes.description: Medical emergency response for injured characters, leading to a community blood drive to help Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance
Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
